name: Henriette Méric-Lalande At Théâtre-Italien
obverse: Head of Henriette Méric-Lalande facing left.
reverse_inscriptions: FESTEGGIATA NEL MDCCCXXIII SIGNORA DEL CANTO ACCLAMAVA NEL MDCCCXXVIII LA SOCIETA' DEL GIARDINO IN MILANO.
references: Musica in Nummis: Beschreibung Der Medailleurarbeiten Auf Musiker #372; Catalogo della collezione A. Ancona di Milano #2202; Evangélikus lyceum, Pozsony, 1884 #205
description: Henriette Méric-Lalande (1798 – 7 September 1867) was a French operatic soprano, one of the leading sopranos of the early 19th century.
